channel.title: A few newb Questions
channel.description:
Hey all, a few questions for you:
1.) I get this when compiling my pimpscape source:
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .
i'm going to guess its not compiling, because when I try to run the server, all I get is this:
Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555
2.) So I guess basically everything is controlled server side? Are most clients open source, in case modifications had to be done client side?

item.title: A few newb Questions
item.dc:creator: @buddy863 buddy863
item.description:
@buddy863 wrote:

make sure to click start server, have runserver open, and have correct port

Read full topic

item.title: A few newb Questions
item.dc:creator: @coolz coolz
item.description:
@coolz wrote:

hidendra:

0.0.0.0 is NOT the IP, use localhost or 127.0.0.1 for IP if your running on the comp. and you don’t put the :5555, go to NEW PORT and put in 5555, and try again.

When I do that, it just says there was an error connecting to the server, and that it was probably down.

Read full topic

item.title: A few newb Questions
item.dc:creator: @BaracudaX BaracudaX
item.description:
@BaracudaX wrote:

gay…

its doing both corectly log in throu mopar with 127.0.0.1

with runserver open…

Read full topic

item.title: A few newb Questions
item.dc:creator: @coolz coolz
item.description:
@coolz wrote:

For now, I didn’t think I needed anything like that to connect to it. Right now, i’m opening up Moparscape and putting in 0.0.0.0:5555 as the IP, and trying to connect.

Read full topic

item.title: A few newb Questions

item.description:

item.title: A few newb Questions
item.dc:creator: @coolz coolz
item.description:
@coolz wrote:

er, ok. So, when I start the server, thats all it should say? Also, when I try to connect with moparscape, it gives me some kind of error and just freezes, although I don’t have the exact error on me.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 12:57:42 PM[/size][hr]Ok, i’ve got everything compiling correctly, but I am unable to connect to my server. How is the server IP controlled? In the code? When I try to connect with Moparscape, as has been said, it just sits there.

Read full topic

item.description:
